entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
